title: Minted Cucumber and Bell Pepper Buttermilk Soup
directions: In a blender purée 1 of the cucumbers, chopped, the yogurt, the salt, the sugar, and the mustard, transfer the purée to a large bowl, and stir in the buttermilk, the bell peppers, the remaining cucumber, diced fine, and the 2 tablespoons chopped mint. Chill the soup, covered, for a least 3 hours or overnight and stir in the lemon juice and salt to taste. Divide the soup among 4 bowls and garnish it with the shredded mint.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons English-style dry mustard, or to taste
1 large red bell pepper, diced fine (about 1 cup)
1 large yellow bell pepper, diced fine (about 1 cup)
2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh mint leaves plus shredded mint leaves for garnish
